code: import*as types from"../types/auth";export var startLogin=function startLogin(username,password){return{type:types.AUTHENTICATION_STARTED,payload:{email:username,password:password}};};export var startSignUp=function startSignUp(name,lastname,username,email,password,age,gender){return{type:types.REGISTRATION_STARTED,payload:{firstname:name,lastname:lastname,username:username,email:email,password:password,age:age,gender:gender,role:1}};};export var completeLogin=function completeLogin(token){return{type:types.AUTHENTICATION_COMPLETED,payload:{token:token}};};export var failLogin=function failLogin(error,form){return{type:types.AUTHENTICATION_FAILED,payload:{error:error,form:form}};};export var logout=function logout(){return{type:types.LOGOUT};};
